page.title: 03Population of Northill
page.content: The population of the Northill area is mainly{working and lower middle class, living mostly in Northill village with small enclaves at Hatch, Thorncote and a portion of Moggerhanger. {The total {population is 550:}225 male and 220 female adults, including 70 senior citizens, and 105 minors under 18 yrs. During the past year there were 5 mar- riages, 3 Christenings and 9 funerals, (7 burials in the village cemetery). Of the{185 dwellings,}30 were built by the Local Authority; 4 of these are now owned privately. 30 adults live alone, 5 in council houses. Most houses are owner-occupied, very few are tenanted.{General Rates}of 159.1p (per pound of Rateable Value) are paid to Mid-Beds. District Council; this includes a 2.3p{Parish Rate. Water and {Sewage Rates}of 39.78p per pound are paid to the Anglian Water Authority.
